title: Boris Epshteyn
added: Epshteyn was the Strategic Advisor and Co-Chair of the Jewish Voices for Trump Advisory Board for President Trump’s 2020 re-election campaign. <ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.jns.org/trumps-jewish-point-person-says-president-has-fought-anti-semitism-everywhere-and-anywhere/|title=Trump’s Jewish point person: President has fought anti-Semitism ‘everywhere and anywhere’|website=JNS|language=en-US|access-date=2021-01-16}}</ref> He led the campaign’s Jewish outreach, appearing in media interviews across national outlets and participating in large-scale events across the country, including in Florida, Pennsylvania, and New York. <ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.timesofisrael.com/at-brooklyn-trump-rally-orthodox-anger-at-mayor-and-governor-take-center-stage/|title=At Brooklyn Trump rally, Orthodox anger at mayor and governor take center stage|website=Times of Israel|language=en-US|access-date=2021-01-16}}</ref>

As a result of the team’s outreach President Trump garnered the highest Jewish support tor a Republican presidential candidate since George W. Bush in 1988, receiving 31% of the vote nationally <ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.npr.org/2020/11/03/929478378/understanding-the-2020-electorate-ap-votecast-survey|title=Understanding The 2020 Electorate: AP VoteCast Survey
